snippet.title: Detached – Multiplayer Teaser Trailer (VR)
snippet.description:
Detached Multiplayer Update is coming soon! Face your rivals in a whole new multiplayer game mode – Race! The battle against yourself as you drifted through the cosmos was just the beginning. Now you’ll enter a true battle in a place where you can forget about gravity. Soon you’ll face your friends in a new multiplayer mode. 

Race will test your determination, your ability to control an advanced EVA suit, and above all your cunning! Show everyone that you’re number one and sign up as a leader in the community rankings. These will remind everyone who’s the best in space.

On top of that, sparring with a friend has never been so easy. The new lobby will allow you to start competing with your friends in a matter of seconds.
What else awaits? Stay tuned for the upcoming announcements later this month.

---
#EnterTheSpace now on the HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, and OSVR.
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/436230/Detached/
Oculus Store: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/945551678861092/

---
Are you going to Gamescom or PAX West? Find the Detached stand and be the first to try the new features in the game! Search for the Detached stand in the following locations:
Gamescom: Hall 4.1, Stand A-015 (Indie Games Poland Booth)
PAX West: Floor 6, Stand 6003 (Indie Games Poland Booth)

---
For more information about the game, visit:

Website: http://detachedgame.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DetachedGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DetachedGame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ansharstudios/
